scripts.clean: npx rimraf ./cypress/reports/test-results && npx rimraf ./cypress/videos/BDD && npx rimraf ./cypress/screenshots/
scripts.all: npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec cypress/integration/**/* && npm run report
scripts.word: npm run clean && npx cypress run --browser chrome --headed --spec cypress/integration/BDD/Wordpress.feature && npm run report
